reviews.review: Much better than Episode One.. I assumed they would never make any more episodes after One since it had been so long, but one day while browsing Steam I noticed this.. very good. Single Player First Person shooters usually bore me, but this one keeps it interesting.. The very beginning is kind of mundane and seems like it will be the average boring bullshit, but once you get into that's when the fun begins. Will keep you running and taking cover.

A stunning piece of DLC that still holds up almost a decade later. This is definitely the most story-focused entry in the Half-Life series. I'm personally not sure whether I agree with this (albeit slight) refocus, but the story is done well and minimally intrusive. If you didn't like how brief the previous entries were on dialogue, this will probably be your favorite one. My only criticism is that some of the scripted sequences go on for a minute or two more than they should. And they almost always explain the very simple plot. Alyx is fleshed out a little more and the rest of supporting cast gets more development- especially the new, and welcome, Dr. Magnusson.

The gameplay is more diverse than any other game in the series. The six or seven hours spent driving, shooting, squishing, jumping, crawling and hurling (with the gravity gun, of course) just zoom by. The levels are nothing you haven't seen before, but they're so well focused and immaculately polished it's impossible not to fall in love with the series all over again. The only brand new enemy is the hunter, which is kind of a strange addition. Their flechette gun is neat and very lethal, but the hunters themselves unfortunately end up being little more than bullet sponges. And unfortunately you can't take the gun from them! What a missed opportunity! Do yourself a favor and stockpile magnum ammo for those suckers. Or just hit them with your car.

# 08.30.2017 update #


发行日期: 2004.11.16 - 2006.06.01 - 2007.10.10 - NEVER
（删除了原来抖的机灵）


虽然并未正式公布，恐怕Valve确实已经终止了这个拖延了10年之久的《半条命3》开发计划——早在将近20个月前（大概也就是HL系列的作者Marc Laidlaw离职的时候，即2016年1月）。

或许在2013年的那次大裁员之后，那个玩家熟悉的锐意进取的V社就已经死了——此后的4年半时间里，Valve再也没能发行一款真正的游戏（Aritifact: Dota2......Are you kidding me?）——取而代之的是一个毫无次世代游戏开发经验的只想背靠Steam躺着数钱的游戏平台提供商。

一个伟大的游戏系列最终却迎来了一个耻辱的烂尾结局。

Wow! That was an excellent gaming experience.  This is the first time I've played Episode Two and although it is about 10 years old it still rivals and surpasses the modern FPS games in many ways.  Fantastic scripting, wonderful variety, well designed levels and an excellent story.  Can you tell I really enjoyed it?  Half-Life 2 sets the bar for excellence in what story-driven FPS should aspire to.  I was never bored or feeling "tired" of sameness. The pacing is near perfect.  The final battle was unique and difficult. Time and time again the game threw the kitchen sink at you and I was left with a feeling that I just barely survived.  Strongly recommended for FPS fans.

E3 2017
Auditorium goes dark. Gabe is airlifted onto stage by massive harness. Once Gabe makes contact with stage, harness is released as the stage creeks from his weight. 20 man team wearing Valve shirts help position him in front of mic. Man standing on Gabe's 3rd chin has brought mic to his mouth. Gabe growls and sucks man in, eating him whole. mic dangles around one of Gabe's K9s.
The lights slowly dim out until they are completely off.
The screen turns on and a giant "H" fades in.
The "H" fades away and is replaced by an "L"
The crowd is going absolutely crazy.
 The "L" fades away and is replaced by a giant "3".
One man claps his hands into bleeding stumps. Another is shitting bricks. 
Several pregnant women give birth in the crowd. 
The "3" fades away and is replaced by an "A" and an "O"
The crowd is confused and wonders what this could possibly mean.
"We at valve are proud to announce"
eyes widen
A quarter of the crowd dies from heart attacks. One man has begun to build a brick house out of his shit.
"Halo 3 Skin Packs for Garry's Mod"
Dead silence
The crowd is now in an uproar. Several murders have been committed within the crowd. Crowd starts to climb up onto stage. Gabe is then fastened into another harness as he begins to be airlifted out. One man climbs onto Gabe. The man is about to attack Gabe's face. Gabe Crushes the man between his boobs Akira style.

[h1] Half-Life 2: Episode 2 [/h1]

Released in 2007, Episode 2 is the second episodic entry in Valve’s Half Life 2 series. It is the direct continuation of Episode 1, following Gordon and Alyx’s perilous journey to reach the White Forest resistance base.

The gameplay takes elements from both its predecessors and integrates them into a much more expansive setting. Large portions of the game take place outside in the sprawling country valleys surrounding City 17. This largely rural environment provides some beautiful vistas, and is a refreshing change of pace from the dense urban landscapes that have come before. The game still plays in a very linear fashion, but the presentation often gives the illusion of a more free roam environment, and makes the linearity far more subtle than the previous instalments.

Episode 2 reintroduces vehicle gameplay to the series, and several of the chapters focus on the player driving around in a modded 1969 Dodge Charger. The car controls pretty well and further helps with the feeling that you are travelling across open terrain in order to reach your goal. Some novel gameplay elements such as adding radar to the car in order to help you find hidden supply caches also provides a nice diversion.

You still have an AI companion with you for large portions of the game, however this is now much more liberally interspersed with independent gameplay. You are often separated from your partners in order to solve puzzles or engage in combat. I feel that the developers found a solid balance here, allowing you enough time on your own to feel a sense of accomplishment at completing objectives by yourself, but also giving you enough emotive scenes with your companions to give the story significance.

There are a couple of new enemies introduced: The Antlion worker comes equipped with a projectile attack which provides more varied enemy behaviour during the Antlion chapters. The more imposing addition is the Combine hunter. These formidable opponents have had their AI specifically designed to act in a pack mentality; surrounding, flanking and enveloping the player. The open and flowing map designs really help to accentuate this concept.

Episode 2 also sees some further graphical improvements to the Source engine. Some notable upgrades include motion blur effects on things like the hunter projectile attacks, and particle system improvements for better flame effects. There have also been further developments in HDR lighting, which can be observed most notably when using the flashlight in the underground tunnel chapters.

Another remarkable addition is the use of what Valve calls cinematic physics. These effects are usually showcased in set piece events where large portions of the landscape are altered in front of the player in a very dynamic manner. A prime example of this is the collapsing railway bridge scene at the start of the game, where huge sections of metal framework plummet down in a convincingly realistic way.

The main criticism that can be levelled at the game is its length. Despite being longer than Episode 1, its seven chapters can still be comfortably completed in less than 10 hours. However, it is worth mentioning that there is also a developer commentary mode which includes tracks by Merle Dandridge (Alyx Vance) if you are at all interested in the design process, or if you simply wish to get a little more replay value. 

Personally, I feel that Episode 2 is the most story driven entry in the series and has some compelling voice acting to enhance this. It is also the most graphically advanced entry, while also providing diverse gameplay throughout. Unfortunately the infamously long wait for Episode 3 continues, however this does not detract from the accomplishments of Episode 2. Overall, it still holds up as an enjoyable gameplay experience 10 years after its release and in many ways is the crowning achievement in the franchise to date.

Сложные скрипты, трогательная игра актеров, головоломки с грави-пушкой, неожиданные повороты сюжета, масштабные перестрелки «с изюминкой», старательно созданные локации – все это мы уже видели, все это мы полюбили. Это просто игра для тех, кому хочется еще! Невероятно зрелищно, захватывающе, кинематографично! От прикосновения к легенде остаются непередаваемые ощущения. Это именно та игра, которая проходится за день на одном дыхании без перерывов на обед, сон и прочие естественные надобности, чтобы потом еще дня три стоять перед глазами. Но потеха потехой, а как же Знание, в коем сила кроется? Игроки из кожи вон лезут, строя всевозможные догадки по поводу интересующих их вопросов. Что было с Фрименом? Кто такой G-Man? Кто такие комбайны? Однако на носу уже второй эпизод, который подарил нам отличный геймплей и атмосферу, но ответов не слишком-то и прибавилось, скорее вопросы новые появились. И главный из них – неужели в пяти часах геймплея третьего эпизода разработчики планируют поместить всю интересующую игроков информацию, все объяснения, всю развязку? Имеют место опасения, что нам скажут «Безусловно, вы все узнаете, но уже из Half Life 3! Встретимся лет, этак, через пять!». Да, Half Life 2 получила от различных изданий более 35 наград «лучшая игра года», но если третий эпизод выйдет в духе второго, игра станет «просто хорошим сериалом», а доктора Фримена, если он когда-либо и удосужится заговорить, слушать уже мало кто станет.

Half-Life 2: Episode Two is better than Episode One in almost every way... the only thing Episode Two is missing is the modified Gravity Gun. (It doesn't make sense, story-wise, for there to be a modified Gravity Gun in Episode Two.)

Episode Two is longer than Episode One, but it sure didn't feel that way. I enjoyed every moment of this game, and time flew by as a result. I did not have to crawl through multiple air vents, nor was I lost in the dark like I was in Episode One. Instead, I was able to drive around, walk over grubs, solve some puzzles, and participate in some rather intense action sequences.

The story (and music) in this game is the best of those available in the "Half-Life 2 saga." The characters show more depth than ever before, which makes them all more likable. Ultimately, the story will tug at your heart strings, but it ends abruptly. If anything, this game's ending is what has most gamers freaking out over a potential Half-Life 3 game. 

Also, it will take you more time and effort to complete these achievements than those in the previous two games. However, you should feel proud of completing a couple of these achievements. The Get Some Grub achievement is no joke, considering you have to find and kill 333 grubs, and the Little Rocket Man achievement is probably this game's most notorious, if not annoying, feat. (Be sure to close the door at the very end, otherwise your hard work will be wasted!)

Simply put, Half-Life 2: Episode Two ends with a bang, and it is far more enjoyable than Episode One. It's a must-play game. If you haven't played Episode Two, then set some time aside; you should really play this game. I can't recommend it enough. This game is a classic. 

For everyone else... y'all know how great this game is. Continue to spread the word.

1. Сварить мясной бульон.
2. Свеклу, морковь, петрушку и лук нарезать соломкой, положить в суповую кастрюлю, добавить помидоры или томат-пюре, уксус, сахар и немного бульона с жиром (или добавить 1-2 ст. ложки масла), закрыть крышкой и поставить овощи тушить. Овощи перемешивать, чтобы не пригорели, прибавляя, если нужно, немного бульона или воды.
3. Через 15-20 минут добавить нашинкованную капусту, все перемешать и тушить еще 20 минут.
4. Затем овощи залить подготовленным мясным бульоном, положить перец, лавровый лист, соль, добавить по вкусу немного уксуса и варить до полной готовности овощей. При подаче на стол в борщ положить сметану.
5. В борщ при варке добавляют картофель в целом виде или нарезанный дольками, а также свежие помидоры. Их также нарезают дольками и кладут в борщ за 5-10 минут до окончания варки. В готовый борщ кроме мяса можно положить вареную ветчину, сосиски или колбасу.
6. Для подкрашивания борща можно сделать свекольный настой. Для этого одну свеклу нарезать ломтиками, залить стаканом горячего бульона, добавить чайную ложку уксуса и поставить на 10-15 минут на слабый огонь и довести до кипения. После этого настой процедить и влить в борщ перед подачей на стол.
好玩，虽然有点老。
this game is good af i really recommended for people who wants to buy this game because it contains a lot of puzzles to solve lolol xdddddddddddd

As expectativas em torno do Half-Life 3 se tornaram tão altas que pode até ser isso que tenha desmotivado a Valve a produzi-lo. Nem que o game fosse o mais fodástico de todos os tempos iria superar o hype em torno dele. A verdade é: a Valve criou um monstro! Um jogo tão bom que ela mesma não consegue superar. Half-Life é uma obra-prima. Assim como ninguém jamais conseguirá pintar outra Mona lisa, não vai ter Half-Life 3. Torço profundamente para que eu esteja errado. Jogo nota 10. Espero até hoje a continuação desse game fabuloso de Half-life 3, tenho fé ainda que vai sair o episode three.
